content: "Honey, quick, quick. There's this website called Tatoeba that's auctioning its sentence collection for a cent each! They've even got special offers like buy 100 sentences and get 1 free!" "Ah great! now people collect sentences as a hobby?! What's the world coming to!"
translations: ita:Amore, presto, presto. C'Ã¨ un sito chiamato Tatoeba che sta vendendo la sua collezione di frasi a un centesimo l'una! Ha
